title: FOAM OUT
long_description: FOAM OUTÂ eliminates foaming in pool water and prevents it from recurring. Rapid results allow you to enjoy your pool immediately.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Slowly pour FOAM OUT directly into the water while walking all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add FOAM OUT according to the application method and recommended dosage. Wait approximately 10 minutes. Repeat treatment if foam has not disappeared. Pool can be used immediately after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: Add 100 mL of FOAM OUT per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: Compatible with salt systems. DO NOT apply the product when swimmers are in the pool. Shake well before using.
